page.title: 11Leisure at Ashfield School.
page.content: The most popular games are football skipping ropes and chasing. Other games- Shadow Game.One is het,if they stand on someones shadow they are het. Hopscotch.Chalk 10 squares on ground. Throw stone to a square and hop to it. Red River.One in middle calls a colour,if you are wearing it,walk across river,if not wearing it,run without being caught. Our Skipping Chant- Nancy in her motorboat, Taking off her petticoat, In jumps a billy goat, And out jumps she. Sometimes we stay in school and listen to music on the tape recorder,read,use the computer or play with big sponge balls in the hall.
